blast.name: Blast
blast.effect: 3" radius area of effect. Roll separately for each model in area. Cover applies normally.

massive_blast.name: Massive Blast
massive_blast.effect: 6" radius area of effect. Roll separately for each model in area. Cover applies normally.

blinding.name: Blinding
blinding.effect: On hit: target is Blinded until end of its next activation. While Blinded: cannot make ranged attacks, -2 dice on melee attacks, cannot use abilities requiring line of sight, move at half speed. An adjacent ally may use an action to clean ink/flash from a Blinded unit (removes Blinded status). Rain or water terrain immediately removes Blinded.

grapple.name: Grapple
grapple.effect: On hit, pull target 3" toward this unit. Target may not move next activation.

ignores_cover.name: Ignores Cover
ignores_cover.effect: Attacks from this weapon ignore cover bonuses to Defense.

pinning_shot.name: Pinning Shot
pinning_shot.effect: Target hit may not move next activation.

quake.name: Quake
quake.effect: All models within 6" must pass Quality test or become Pinned.

rapid_fire.name: Rapid Fire
rapid_fire.effect: May split attack dice between multiple targets within range. Used by Jager marksmen.

sonic.name: Sonic
sonic.effect: Ignores Heavy Armor bonus. Ignores cover bonuses to Defense. If at least 1 damage dealt, target tests Morale.

melee.name: Melee
melee.effect: Can be used in close combat. Does not require Line of Sight.

prybar.name: Prybar
prybar.effect: Gain +1 die when attempting Interact actions on locked or sealed objectives.
